skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: halloween six word stories
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Six Word Stories are brief and powerful. Here are a collection of frightening six word stories made for Halloween, to scare you a little, and add to the fun. Each story is randomly selected each time for your repeated listening enjoyment.

Have all of your friends play one, and see which one is the scariest. Happy Halloween!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
